descriptionHtml:
==========
Description
==========
I was always annoyed at the fact that Skjor never wore gloves, so I finally decided to throw together a mod to fix that. This mod will do just what the title says, make Skjor wear Wolf Gloves along with his normal Wolf Armor.

==========
Installation
==========
\"Download with manager\" and activate
or...
drag the contents of the file to your Data folder

============
Uninstallation
============
Deactivate in NMM
or...
delete \"SkjorWolfGloves.esp\"

============
Compatibility
============
Will be incompatible with anything that alters Skjor\'s default outfit

======
Credits
======
Bethesda for making Skyrim and the CK

Enjoy!!!
author: Hatwig
